text: 6|6|Tara ki dekhe na [1] ye, amara tadera age bahu prajanmake [2] binasa karechi; taderake yamine emanabhabe pratistita karechilama yemanati tomaderake'o karini ebam tadera upara musaladhare brsti barsana karechilama. Ara tadera padadese nadi prabahita karechilama; tarapara tadera papera jan'ya taderake binasa karechi [3] ebam tadera para an'ya prajanmake srsti karechi [4].
